actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of polyester fleece sheet sets entered on or after January 29, 2009, and on or before October 27, 2009.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) to provide for the reliquidation (refund of duties) of certain entries of polyester fleece sheet sets.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of polyester fleece sheet sets entered on or after January 29, 2009, and on or before October 27, 2009.
